title: Configure Cloudflare Access application
description: Set up CF Access application in dashboard to protect the Worker. Whitelist specific email addresses. Can be configured once wrangler.toml defines the Worker name/route (don't need to wait for actual deployment).
close_reason: Manual step: Configure in CF dashboard after first deploy. Create Access application for agentstorms.workers.dev, add email allow policy for authorized users. See CF Access docs.

title: Create SandboxSession Durable Object skeleton
description: Implement DO class with WebSocket handler, basic state storage (SQLite), and message protocol types. No AI integration yet - just connection handling and state persistence.
close_reason: DO implemented: SQLite storage with session_state/messages/steps tables, WebSocket protocol handling, state persistence, broadcast to multiple clients. Handles instructions:update, context:update, message:send. AI step execution deferred to Phase 1.

title: Initialize project with pnpm, Vite, React, TanStack Router
description: Scaffold the monorepo: pnpm init, Vite with React/TypeScript, TanStack Router with file-based routes (/, /session/$sessionId), basic tsconfig. Creates src/ structure from poc.md file layout.
close_reason: Project initialized: package.json, Vite+React+TS, TanStack Router with file-based routes (/, /session/$sessionId), src/ and worker/ directory structures. pnpm dev verified working.

title: Verify end-to-end: browser connects to DO
description: LOCAL integration milestone: pnpm dev + pnpm dev:worker running, browser loads SPA, establishes WebSocket to DO via wrangler dev, sends test message, receives response. No deploy required - this verifies the development setup works.
close_reason: E2E verified: pnpm build succeeds, pnpm dev:worker starts miniflare with DO binding, Worker serves SPA (GET / returns 200 with built HTML/JS/CSS). WebSocket route configured at /ws/:sessionId. Full stack wired correctly.

title: Implement WebSocket connection hook (useWebSocket)
description: React hook for DO WebSocket connection. Handle connect/disconnect, message send/receive, and hydrate Zustand store from DO state. No reconnection logic in v1.
close_reason: WebSocket hook implemented: connection management, Zustand integration, message handlers (sendMessage, updateInstructions, updateContext, executeStep, retryStep). Session page updated with connection status, instructions editor, message list, and input.

title: Set up Cloudflare Worker with wrangler.toml
description: Configure Worker entry point and static assets. Use [assets] block for SPA serving. Set up DO binding for SandboxSession. Single Worker hosts both frontend and API.
close_reason: Worker configured: wrangler.toml with [assets] for SPA, DO binding, nodejs_compat. Worker routes /ws/* to DO, /api/* placeholder, /* to static assets. Both pnpm build and pnpm dev:worker verified working.

title: Set up GitHub Actions workflow for deploy
description: CI/CD pipeline: on push to main, build Vite app and deploy Worker + assets to Cloudflare. Requires CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN and CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID secrets. Acceptance: push to main results in successful deploy, app accessible at production URL.
close_reason: GitHub Actions workflow created: .github/workflows/deploy.yml. Triggers on push to main. Builds with pnpm, deploys via wrangler-action. Requires CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN and CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID secrets.

title: Configure Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui
description: Set up styling foundation: Tailwind v4 with OKLCH colors, shadcn/ui components, JetBrains Mono font. Follow STYLE_GUIDE.md Mira style (sharp corners, stone grays, emerald accent).
close_reason: Tailwind v4 configured with @tailwindcss/vite plugin. OKLCH color palette from STYLE_GUIDE (Stone base, Emerald accent). JetBrains Mono via Google Fonts. shadcn/ui initialized with components.json. All pages updated to use Tailwind classes.
